Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne ni tsingongo tsinga etsiakhwanyasia etsiali nitsikholanga amabii, mana nikhuloonga inyuma wabu Abandu bandi
Ne olwa balola eshinyasio shiefu, mana hawo nibachaka okhwilukha
Mulelukha tawe, kalukhe khubwokholo bwenyu, nende mubimenyo bienyu khomunyoole okhureebwa
Baboola mbu: “abaane toto efwe khwali abamabii.”
Ne nibatsililila okhulila khwabu okho okhula shingala khwabakhola shinga babererwe basimile (bafwile)
Ne nishikhwalonga likulu nende eshialo nende ebili hakari wabio khumubayo tawe
Nekhwenyanga	okhukhola omubayo, khwakhekholele efwe abeene, (sikhwakhabarere hakari tawe) toto khubetsanga abakholanga omubayo
Halali khusukunanga abwatoto khububeyi mana nibufunaka (obubeyi obo) niburulaho, ne toto muli nende eshinyasio eshilulu shibalindanga khukamuboolanga kano
Ne ni ebibie bioosi bili mwikulu nende khushialo, ne abali ewuwe shibafuranga okhumulaama nohomba shibachonyanga tawe
Bamwitsominjia eshilo neshitere ne shibachonyanga tawe

Abanyasaye bandi babetsangamwo (mwikulu nende khushilalo) abalali Nyasaye tawe toto hawo (likulu nende eshialo) biakhabiyile. Ne oluyali lwoosi ni lwa Nyasaye, Omwami we shisaala (Arsh) ali ehale nende akabamuboolangakhwo ako

Nohomba bekholela Abanyasaye bandi abalali Nyasaye tawe? Boola mbu; “Rere ebifune bienyu, kano ni ametsulisio ka bano abali halala ninasi, nende ametsulisio khu balia abali inyuma wanje” Halali abaanji mubo shibamanyile obwatieli tawe, kho mana shibakabukulilangamwo oluchendo tawe
